name: Simple Calibration
description: Basic calibration for learning and simple tasks. Supports sequential and parallel group execution.

name: Full Chip Calibration
description: Complete chip calibration: 1-qubit + CR scheduling + 2-qubit with automatic quality filtering.

name: Parameter Sweep
description: Execute a task repeatedly with different parameter values for exploring parameter space.

name: Parallel Retry Calibration
description: Parallel execution with @task + submit(). Demonstrates retry logic with frequency offset.

name: Two-Qubit Calibration
description: 2-qubit coupling calibration (Cross Resonance, ZX90, Bell state) with parallel execution.

name: Check Skew
description: System-level skew measurement and calibration across MUX channels.
